<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Breastplate of the Mountain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2137)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 70,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Constructed of dull gray metal, this [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10) is decorated with the symbol of a craggy black mountaintop. This breastplate functions as a _+3 [greater resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) breastplate_. When you're [Shoved](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) or otherwise [forced to move](/Rules.aspx?ID=451), you can reduce the amount you move by up to 10 feet. When you invest the breastplate, you either increase your Constitution modifier by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever is higher.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You pound a solid and constant rhythm on your breastplate and cast a 7th-level [_regeneration_](/Spells.aspx?ID=248) spell on yourself.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** With a single tap, you gain immunity to [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) for 1 minute.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You fail or critically fail a Fortitude saving throw;  **Effect** If you failed the saving throw, it becomes a success. If you critically failed, it becomes a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Breastplate of the Mountain
